main event: Civilians reported seeing two bright objects in the sky moving in an erratic manner for approximately 1.5 minutes before disappearing from view on November 7, 1955.
interesting points: The objects were described as a dark red light without sound or maneuvers., The sighting lasted about 5 minutes., The report was part of Project Blue Book, an official U.S. Air Force program., John Kincaid documented the sighting., Possible causes for the sighting remain unknown.
sighted object: two bright objects in the sky
